SMQ681.label: Smoked tobacco last 5 days?
SMQ681.text: During the past 5 days, including today, did you smoke cigarettes, pipes, cigars, little cigars or cigarillos, water pipes, hookahs, or e-cigarettes?
SMQ681.target: Both males and females 12 YEARS - 150 YEARS

SMQ690B.label: Used last 5 days - Pipes
SMQ690B.text: Which of these products did you use? (Check all that apply)
SMQ690B.target: Both males and females 12 YEARS - 150 YEARS

SMQ740.label: # days smoked pipe over last 5 days
SMQ740.text: During the past 5 days, on how many days did you smoke a pipe?
SMQ740.target: Both males and females 12 YEARS - 150 YEARS
SMQ740.instructions: Enter number of days. Range: 1 to 5

SMQ690C.label: Used last 5 days - Cigars
SMQ690C.text: Which of these products did you use? (Check all that apply)
SMQ690C.target: Both males and females 12 YEARS - 150 YEARS
